head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FIDALL, HELEN BLUMSTEIN.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FIDALL, HELEN BLUMSTEIN.

block.p: FIDALL-Helen Blumstein. Beloved wife of the late Julius Blumstein and David Fidall. Loving mother of Neil & Sylvia, Howard & Esther. Devoted grandmother of Julie & Keith Hochstin, Andrew & Amy Blumstein, Peter Blumstein, Rachel Blumstein, Jonah Blumstein. Dear great-grandmother of Chase, Chelsea & Alexa Hochstin & Max Blumstein. Services today, at 12 Noon, ''Parkside'' Chapels, Queens Boulevard and 66 Avenue, Forest Hills, New York.
